Detailed Description

template<int dimworld>
class Dune::FoamGrid< dimworld >

An implementation of the Dune grid interface: a 2d simplicial grid in an n-dimensional world.

Template Parameters:
dimworld Dimension of the world space

template<int dimworld>
bool Dune::FoamGrid< dimworld >::mark ( int  refCount,
const typename Traits::template Codim< 0 >::EntityPointer &  e 
) [inline]

Mark entity for refinement.

This only works for entities of codim 0. The parameter is currently ignored

Returns:
  • true, if marking was successful
  • false, if marking was not possible

template<int dimworld>
int Dune::FoamGrid< dimworld >::maxLevel (  )  const [inline]

Return maximum level defined in this grid. Levels are numbered 0 ... maxlevel with 0 the coarsest level.

Referenced by Dune::FoamGrid< dimworld >::lbegin(), Dune::FoamGrid< dimworld >::lend(), and Dune::FoamGrid< dimworld >::levelIndexSet().
